main event: A bright, round object was observed hovering and moving rapidly in the sky over Laurel, Montana.
interesting points: The object was bright and saucer-like, visible for approximately 15-20 minutes., Witnesses reported it traveling at tremendous speed., The object was described as larger than a star and with a bluish-green color., Observers included a civilian ground observer with military experience., The sighting occurred during clear weather conditions with no aerial activity at the time.
witnesses: civilian ground observer and another local observer
